name: Hulu Grey Hourglass Table Lamp
description: This show-stopping, hourglass-shaped ceramic lamp is handmade and finished in a beautiful grey glaze with a subtle matt patina. Please note that each of these lamp bases are hand glazed and fired and as a result the colours and glaze will vary. Its pleasing silhouette, combined with an acrylic stand, looks at home on a console table or sideboard. Pair with a plain or patterned lampshade, as you prefer, but we recommend a 40-50cm diameter shade with this design.
